akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 94–350, title V, § 516, July 12, 1976, 90 Stat. 845

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1083. Repealed. Pub. L. 94–350, title V, § 516, July 12, 1976, 90 Stat. 845
Section, act Aug. 13, 1946, ch. 957, title VIII, § 833, 60 Stat. 1022, provided for retirement of non Foreign Service officers and chiefs of missions.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Oct. 1, 1976, see Pub. L. 94–350, title V, § 524(a), July 12, 1976, 90 Stat. 848.
